listings.title: Listing 1: Cozy Apartment
descriptions: A comfortable 2-bedroom apartment in the city center.
Perfect for families or small groups.

listings.title: Listing 2: Beach House
descriptions: Spacious house with stunning ocean views.
Includes a private pool and beach access.

listings.title: Listing 3: Mountain Cabin
descriptions: Rustic cabin nestled in the woods.
Great for weekend getaways or hiking trips.
